description: A plastic printed copy of H&K MP5A2, a highly-successful SMG known for its accuracy and handling. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less durable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A plastic printed copy of MAC-10, popular with the military despite the gun's relatively-low quality. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less durable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.

A plastic printed copy of Uzi, highly-successful for more than 60 years. Barrel and firing pin are made out of high-quality polymer compound, able to weather gunfire significantly better than regular plastic. Less durable than its market counterpart, but an effective firearm if you have nothing else available.
